member.name: T:Microsoft.WebAnalytics.Behaviors.Handlers.HandleMediaElement
member.summary: Track a MediaElement CurrentStateChanged, MediaOpened, and MediaFailed events
member.remarks:
Platforms Windows Phone 7, Silverlight 3, Silverlight 4, WPF
AnalyticsEvent.Name CurrentStateChanged, MediaOpened, MediaFailed
Windows Phone 7 Required Capabilities ID_CAP_NETWORKING, ID_CAP_MEDIALIB
For Windows Phone 7, this is in the Microsoft.WebAnalytics.Media.WP7 assembly.

member.name: P:Microsoft.WebAnalytics.Behaviors.Handlers.HandleMediaElement.Log
member.summary: Gets or sets the event Logging method
